name: Planet Hunt
description:
You have been sent on a mission to a planet filled with dangerous animals.  One animal in particular needs to be exterminated.  It's up to you how to go about this - search for that one dangerous animal, slaughter everything in sight, or something in between.

Use the left and right arrow keys to steer, the up arrow to accelerate, and space to target and shoot the animals.  Space will target the nearest animal.  Pressing space again will zap it.  At any time you can choose to return to the map screen by pressing the 'M' key.  From there you can land again in a different area, or generate a new random planet to visit.  Use your mouse to choose a landing location.

This game was created in just under four hours for Trijam #136.  All assets were created by Jeff Hanson.  The music was made in BeepBox (beepbox.co), the sound effects in Bfxr (bfxr.net), and the game itself was programmed in GameMaker Studio 2 (yoyogames.com).
